Package ca.uqac.lif.cep.peg

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AverageLength
    Mining function that computes the average length of a set of sequences.
    AverageValues
    Mining function that computes the average of values in a set of sequences of numbers.
    Main  
    MapDistance
    Computes the distance between two maps.
    MapDistance.ToValueArray
    From an array whose keys are strings, extracts a list of values, placed in increasing key order.
    Normalize
    Normalizes a collection of numbers
    PointDistance  
    ProcessorMiningFunction<T,U>
    Mining function that uses BeepBeep processors to extract patterns from traces.
    SelfCorrelatedTrendDistance<P,Q,R>  
    Sequence<S>
    Representation of a finite stream of events of a specific type.
    SetMiningFunction<T,U>
    Extracts a pattern from a set of sequences.
    TrendDistance<P,Q,R>  
    VectorDistance
    Computes a distance metric between two numerical vectors.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PegException
    Generic exception raised by the use of a PEG
